name: tool-vault-packager
description: ToolVault packaging system for creating deployable .pyz files

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf tmp_package_contents && rm -rf node_modules/@debrief
scripts.prepare-deps: mkdir -p node_modules/@debrief && if [ -d "shared-types" ]; then ln -sf $(readlink -f shared-types) node_modules/@debrief/shared-types; else ln -sf $(readlink -f ../shared-types) node_modules/@debrief/shared-types; fi
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && python packager.py tools --output dist/toolvault.pyz
scripts.build:spa: npm run prepare-deps && cd spa && npm run prepare-deps && cp package.json package.json.bak && sed 's|"workspace:\^1\.0\.0"|"file:../shared-types"|g' package.json.bak > package.json && npm install && npm run build && mv package.json.bak package.json
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run build:spa
scripts.test: test -f dist/toolvault.pyz && echo 'Test passed: dist/toolvault.pyz exists' || (echo 'Test failed: dist/toolvault.pyz not found' && exit 1)

author: ToolVault
